feed.subtitle: A series of daily landscape photographs by Daniel Sofer, 20 years running.

entry.title: Horikawa・堀川
entry.content:
The revitalized Horikawa River, now a quiet park slightly below street level, with cherry blossoms in full bloom.

桜満開の堀川。

entry.title: Mankai・満開
entry.content:
Cherry blossoms are peaking in Arashiyama Park. In a week they'll be gone.

嵐山公園の桜が見頃です。あと1週間で散ってしまいます。

entry.title: Osaka Castle・大阪城
entry.content:
So many cherry blossoms surrounding Osaka Castle. Many people doing hanami, a party under the cherry trees.

大阪城を囲むたくさんの桜。桜の木の下でお花見をしている人が多い。

entry.title: Nakanoshima・中ノ島
entry.content:
Weeping cherry tree in Arashiyama this morning.

今朝の嵐山・中ノ島しだれ桜。
entry.summary: Weeping cherry tree in Arashiyama this morning. 今朝の嵐山・中ノ島しだれ桜。

entry.title: Arashiyama Sakura・嵐山の桜
entry.content:
Cherry blossoms are in full bloom now, and everyone is out and enjoying them at Nakanoshima Park.

今日は桜が満開です。中ノ島公園の桜を楽しむ人々。

entry.title: Arashiyama Morning・朝の嵐山
entry.content:
Rowboats beneath a cherry tree, on the Oi (Katsura) River, a few mornings ago.

桜の木の下の手漕ぎボート、数日前の朝、大堰川（桂川）。
entry.summary: Rowboats beneath a cherry tree, on the Oi (Katsura) River, a few mornings ago. 桜の木の下の手漕ぎボート、数日前の朝、大堰川（桂川）。

entry.title: Tenryu-ji・天龍寺
entry.content:
The large weeping cherry tree at Tenryu-ji Temple is in full bloom now. Even though I arrived soon after opening, the temple was quite crowded with numerous tour buses in front. Fortunately, I was able to get a photo without a million people in it.

満開の天龍寺のしだれ桜。開店直後に着いたにもかかわらず、ツアーバスが何台も走っていて、かなり混雑していましたが、ものすごい人が写り込んでいない写真を撮ることができました。

entry.title: Arashiyama Sakura・嵐山の桜
entry.content:
Flowering cherry blossoms in front of Arashiyama's Togetsukyo Bridge. 2 or 3 days ago none of these trees had bloomed. But I've noticed some of the new blooming trees also have leaves coming out, so I'm not sure how long the flowers will last.

嵐山渡月橋前の桜。 2、3日前は、どの木も花が咲いていませんでした。でも、新しく花が咲いた木には葉っぱも出てきているので、いつまで花が持つかわかりません。

entry.title: Closer & Closer・より近く
entry.content:
So many beautiful cherry blossoms on this tree, I had to crop this photo tighter and tighter until I could make a composition my eye could appreciate.

この木にはたくさんの美しい桜が咲いていました。私の目が満足する構図ができるまで、この写真を狭く狭くトリミングしなければなりませんでした。

entry.title: Jojakkoji Temple・常寂光寺
entry.content:
After a long interval of cold, rainy weather, a few days of warm sunshine and... poof! Now the cherry blossoms are coming out everywhere in Kyoto. This is at Jojakkoji temple in Arashiyama.

長い間、冷たい雨が降り続いた後、暖かい日差しが数日続き、そして...パッ！今、京都のあちこちで桜が咲いています。これは嵐山の常寂光寺。
